Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 1280 Site Plan Review

1280.01 Title** 1280.02Site plan required. 1280.03Submission of site plan. 1280.04Site plan contents. 1280.05Supplementing or eliminating requirements. 1280.06Staff review. 1280.07Site plan review criteria applicable to all land uses. 1280.08Site plan review criteria applicable to particular land uses. 1280.09Modification of plan under review. 1280.10Approval or disapproval. 1280.11Exterior facade design standards. 1280.12Control of issuance of building permits, etc.; restriction of uses. 1280.13Site plan as condition of zoning certificate and continuation of use. 1280.14Modification of approved site plan. 1280.15Exemptions. 1280.16Administrative rules authorized. 1280.17Burden of proof; standard of proof. 1280.18Expiration of approvals.

CROSS REFERENCES

Supplemental Regulations - see Chapter 1270

Administration, enforcement and penalty - see P. & Z. Ch. 1262

Issuance of zoning certificates upon site plan approval - see P.& Z. 1262.12

Site plans required - see P. & Z. 1270.02
